author: ate
msg: RAVE-696: rave-web-jcr - major cleanup and restructuring of jcr mapping
- replace and downscale 'Document' naming and type to mere 'Content' without specific structure (yet, in this low-level scope)
- add @ContentType annotation to logically mark different Content types (beans) without need for specialized node types
- the @ContentType annotation on will be used to dynamically search, discover and register manageable beans by the ContentManager (TODO)
- align and wire BinaryRepositoryController as Routed Controller, now is automatically handled and picked up under a Route of your choice...
